publication_year.description: Year of the publication as a four-digit integer, like 2022

language_as_iso639-2.description: Language of the publication in ISO 639-2 code, like 'dan' for Danish

identifiers.description: Unique identifiers for the publication, like ISBN

publisher.description: List of publishers of the publication

creator_persons.description: List of individual creators (authors, illustrators, etc.) of the publication. The role of the creator should be added in square brackets after the name e.g. 'Jens Hansen [forfatter]'

creator_corporations.description: List of corporate creators (organizations, companies, etc.) of the publication. The role of the creator should be added in square brackets after the name e.g. 'Sundhedsstyrelsen [udgiver]'

country_of_publication_iso639-1.description: List of countries where the publication was published, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code, like 'dk' for Denmark
